scripts.setup:github: bash -c 'USER_NAME="Steven Cao"; USER_EMAIL="stevencao2015@gmail.com"; BRANCH=main; REPO_URL="git@github.com:stevencao2020/gaowei-assistant.git"; git config --global user.name "$USER_NAME"; git config --global user.email "$USER_EMAIL"; if [ ! -d .git ]; then git init; fi; git remote remove origin 2>/dev/null || true; git remote add origin "$REPO_URL"; git branch -M "$BRANCH"; git add .; git commit -m "Initial commit" || true; git push -u origin "$BRANCH";'
scripts.fix:ssh443: bash -lc 'mkdir -p ~/.ssh && { echo Host github.com; echo Hostname ssh.github.com; echo Port 443; echo User git; echo ServerAliveInterval 60; } > ~/.ssh/config && chmod 600 ~/.ssh/config && ssh -T git@github.com || true'
